name: Skein
description: Run The Procedural Gauntlet! Skein is a procedural dungeon shooter in an "old-skool" arcade style for one or two players where you must battle through hordes of monsters on a quest to save the soul of a talking sheep.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: AMD/INTEL DUAL-CORE 2.5 GHZ Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB DirectXÂ® 9 and shaders 2.0 compatible (NVIDIA GEFORCE 6600 / ATI RADEON X700 or higher) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
